channel.title: I Think Its Called Perfect Combat!
channel.description:
First of all im shaymin.
i forget my account my password so i made this one.
My Server Base : Combattscape
Problem: When you in pk and try to attack someone he get close to him but he take 1-2 seconds to attack.
Fix The Problem: I Saw in other pravite servers that i play..that when attack someone you get close to him and immdeitly attack.
Any Toutrials for help?
NOTE: if someone didnt understand i can upload a video that explain.
Thanks :)

item.title: I Think Its Called Perfect Combat!
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Shaymin Owner Shaymin
item.description:
@Owner_Shaymin wrote:

kk i wait more if someone can help

anyways thx for reading

Read full topic
item.source: I Think Its Called Perfect Combat!

item.title: I Think Its Called Perfect Combat!
item.dc:creator: @durial12 durial12
item.description:
@durial12 wrote:

I’m guessing this is delta based?

People have said to have fixed this against other players in PvP, but not against NPC’s How they did it, I’m not quite sure.

I believe the 1-2 second delay is caused by the process() method which isn’t very well coded.

Read full topic
item.source: I Think Its Called Perfect Combat!
